sections.heading: General; Emergency Management Act; administer
sections.text: There is hereby created in the office of the Adjutant General the Nebraska Emergency Management Agency. The Adjutant General shall administer the Emergency Management Act.SourceLaws 1953, c. 336, ยง 2, p. 1106;Laws 1996, LB 43, ยง 16.Cross ReferencesEmerge
